trans-unit.source: Base type for <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> and any custom conditions created by users.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition" /> 的基底型別 (Base Type) 和使用者建立的任何自訂條件。

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中實作時，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates a deep copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，建立目前 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> 的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> that is identical to this instance
trans-unit.target: 與這個執行個體完全相同的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />

trans-unit.source: The runtime context the rule is running in.
trans-unit.target: 其中有執行規則的執行階段內容。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, evaluates the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會評估 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> evaluated to <see langword="true" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />，顯示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> 評估為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> that was used previously in a call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleAction.Validate(System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation)" />.
When overridden in a derived class, gets the dependencies for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> 的相依性。

trans-unit.source: A list of symbols that represent entities read by the condition.
trans-unit.target: 符號清單，這些符號代表條件所讀取的實體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> 的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Called when all properties have been given values.
trans-unit.target: 當所有屬性已有指定的值時呼叫。

trans-unit.source: After this call, no properties can be modified.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫後，就無法修改任何屬性。

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> that is used to manage the validation of rules and rule conditions.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation" /> 的執行個體，用於管理規則與規則條件的驗證。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，會驗證 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> 已正確設定，而且沒有任何錯誤。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to show that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> has no errors; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />，顯示 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition" /> 沒有錯誤，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> 包含錯誤 (`Validate` 方法傳回 `false`)，則 <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 將會包含所遭遇之錯誤的清單。
